REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1520 reute d f BC-LORIMAR-<LT>-GETS-OUT 04-07 0055

TEXT.TITLE: LORIMAR <LT> GETS OUTBOARD MARINE <OMC> PACT
TEXT.BODY: Lorimar/Telepictures Corp said its Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon and Eckhardt unit has been named the advertising agency for the Lawn Boy unit of Outboard Marine Corp <OMC>, replacing Walker and Associates. Annual billings are estimated at four mln dlrs, it said. Reuter
